page.title: 06OTHER OCCUPATIONS
page.content: {Elisabeth interviewed her mother, Mrs. {Finch - the lollypop lady:}She has to help the children across the road. She wears a white coat and a blue hat and in the winter she wears white gloves. She gets very cold in the winter. {Laura wrote about the postman:}He wears special clothes. His number on his badge is 1135. He has to get up at 5 o'clock. Other postmen have vans, but he has to walk. Once he was attacked by a chicken. {Elizabeth wrote about Mrs. Williams, {the Health Visitor:} She works from 9 a.m. to 5 a.m. each day, but is on call 24 hours a day. In the surgery she cares for children. She is very kind-hearted. She visits people in their homes.
